‘Black Mirror’ Season 4 Episode Titles, Cast, Teaser Revealed《黑镜》第四季预告片曝光，6集标题抢先看

Netflix has announced the episode titles and cast for “Black Mirror’s” fourth season, which will premiere on the streaming service later this year.《黑镜》第四季将于今年晚些时候在流媒体上播出，而Netflix也公布了每集的标题以及每集出场的演员阵容。

Since “Black Mirror” is an anthology series, each episode is designed as a standalone story. Each one explores the theme of “collective unease with the modern world,” depicting various new ways advanced technology transforms lives – from rating every interaction to uploading one’s consciousness after death to virtually live forever.《黑镜》第四季延续前面的诗选剧集风格，每一集都是一个独立的故事。它以“现代社会中的群体焦虑”现象为背景，讲述了先进科技给生活带来的多方变化，小至评估人际互动，大到将已逝之人的意识上传到网上以获得永生。

The episodes listed below are in alphabetical order and do not necessarily reflect the order they will be presented in when available for streaming. Series creator Charlie Brooker has written every episode of the fourth season.以下剧集顺序随机排列，在播出时会有所变化。Charlie Brooker是本剧的主创。

“Arkangel” stars Rosemarie Dewitt, Brenna Harding and Owen Teague. It is directed by Jodie Foster.《方舟天使》，演员：Rosemarie Dewitt，Brenna Harding，Owen Teague，导演：Jodie Foster

“Black Museum” stars Douglas Hodge, Letitia Wright and Babs Olusanmokun. It is directed by Colm McCarthy.《黑色博物馆》演员：Douglas Hodge，Letitia Wright ，Babs Olusanmokun，导演：Colm McCarthy

“Crocodile” stars Andrea Riseborough, Andrew Gower and Kiran Sonia Sawar. It is directed by John Hillcoat.《鳄鱼》演员：Andrea Riseborough，Andrew Gower ， Kiran Sonia Sawar ，导演：John Hillcoat

“Hang the DJ” stars Georgina Campbell, Joe Cole and George Blagden. It is directed by Tim Van Patten.《绞死DJ》演员：Georgina Campbell, Joe Cole ，George Blagden，导演：Tim Van Patten

“Metalhead” stars Maxine Peake, Jake Davies and Clint Dyer. It is directed by David Slade.《金属头》演员：Maxine Peake，Jake Davies，Clint Dyer 导演：David Slade

“USS Callister” stars Jesse Plemons, Cristin Milioti, Jimmi Simpson and Michaela Coel. It is directed by Toby Haynes. Brooker has co-written this episode with William Bridges.《卡里斯特号飞船》演员：Jesse Plemons, Cristin Milioti, Jimmi Simpson， Michaela Coel，导演：Toby Haynes（本集由Brooker和William Bridges联合创作。） 

（翻译：进击的Meredith）
